# photoSettingsForSceneMonitoring

**Instance Property**

A photo settings object that controls how the photo output detects and handles automatic flash and stabilization modes.

## Declaration

```swift
@NSCopying var photoSettingsForSceneMonitoring: AVCapturePhotoSettings? { get set }
```

## Discussion

Set the [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVCapturePhotoSettings/flashMode] and [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVCapturePhotoSettings/isAutoStillImageStabilizationEnabled] properties of this photo settings object to influence the values of the photo output’s scene monitoring properties ([doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVCapturePhotoOutput/isFlashScene] and [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVCapturePhotoOutput/isStillImageStabilizationScene]). For example, if you set the [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVCapturePhotoSettings/flashMode] property of this photo settings object to [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVCaptureDevice/FlashMode-swift.enum/off], the photo output’s [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVCapturePhotoOutput/isFlashScene] property reports [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false] regardless of lighting conditions in the visible scene. If you set this photo settings object’s [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVCapturePhotoSettings/flashMode] property to [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVCaptureDevice/FlashMode-swift.enum/auto] or [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVCaptureDevice/FlashMode-swift.enum/on], the photo output’s [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVCapturePhotoOutput/isFlashScene] property reverts to its default behavior of returning [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true] or [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false] based on the visible light level.



The default value is an [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVCapturePhotoSettings] object with the following settings:

- [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVCapturePhotoSettings/flashMode]: [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVCaptureDevice/FlashMode-swift.enum/auto]
- [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVCapturePhotoSettings/isAutoStillImageStabilizationEnabled]: [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true]

The photo output ignores all other properties of this photo settings object. To control other photo settings when requesting capture, create a photo settings object to pass to the [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVCapturePhotoOutput/capturePhoto(with:delegate:)] method.

## Monitoring the visible scene

- **isFlashScene**: A Boolean value indicating whether the scene currently being previewed by the camera warrants use of the flash.
